snippet: The high-end real estate market is enjoying a remarkable rise, fueled largely by wealthy Russians.
abstract: High-end real estate market in the United States is enjoying a remarkable boom, propelled by money flowing in from all corners of the globe, but particularly from Russia; Russians and other citizens of the former Soviet Union have signed contracts to buy more than $1 billion worth of residential real estate in the United States over the past four years.

byline.contributor: Olga Slobodchikova contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: The high-end real estate market is enjoying a remarkable rise, fueled largely by wealthy Russians.

headline.seo: Russians Court Luxury Real Estate With Record-Breaking Sales
headline.main: Time to Sell Penthouse. The Russians Have Cash.
headline.print_headline: Time to Sell Penthouse. The Russians Have Cash.
